movies.name: The Sheriffs Are Coming
movies.details: High Court Enforcement Officers, who have been known as Sheriffs since Saxon times, have higher powers than bailiffs and can force people who refuse to pay judgements to do so, or seize goods of equivalent value for a £60 fee.

movies.name: Judge Judy
movies.details: Judge Judy Sheindlin, a former judge from New York, tackles actual, small claims cases with her no-nonsense attitude in which damages of no more than $5,000 can be awarded.

movies.name: The Sheriff of the Fractured Jaw
movies.details: After inadvertently stopping an Indian attack on his stagecoach while traveling in the American West, an English gentleman finds himself appointed sheriff of a nearby town.

movies.name: A Family for Joe
movies.details: To keep from being separated, four orphans get a homeless maverick to pose as their guardian.

movies.name: The Judge is a Woman
movies.details: Alice Nevers is a young and beautiful woman investigating judge. With her partner, a policeman, Fred Marchand, they use their own power to solve crimes to each their method.

movies.name: Attack on Titan: Part 2
movies.details: A young boy name Eren Jaeger has to use his gift to know about the mystery of the Titans..

movies.name: Motocycle Gang
movies.details: Cal and his family are driving to their new home in California and are terrorized by a motorcycle gang along the highway.

movies.name: Zombies
movies.details: Students from Zombietown are transferred to a high school in a suburban town preoccupied with uniformity, traditions and pep rallies.

movies.name: Inspector George Gently
movies.details: With the help of DS John Bacchus, Inspector George Gently spends his days bringing to justice members of the criminal underworld who are unfortunate enough to have the intrepid investigator assigned to their cases.

movies.name: Unearthed
movies.details: An unknown creature terrorizes an archeological dig in the middle of a desolate New Mexico town.

movies.name: The Sheriff of Cochise
movies.details: While this sounds like a western, THE SHERIFF OF COCHISE was a contemporary police drama set in Cochise County, AZ. Stories seemed to be strangely similar to HIGHWAY PATROL, emphasizing fistfights and car chases rather than gunplay.

movies.name: My Spy Family
movies.details: My Spy Family is a children's Live action comedy series created by Paul Alexander. The show is about the Family Bannon, who all have strong spy links.

movies.name: Better Criminal
movies.details: A police officer is forced to work for two warring crime syndicates while under an internal investigation.

movies.name: Bad Teacher
movies.details: Centers on a sexy, foul-mouthed divorcée who becomes a teacher to find her next husband.

movies.name: Fake News
movies.details: Maxwell Stern is a freelance reporter who writes for the politics rag. Some of his stories are true, some - Not so much. After a prostitute is murdered who was a source for one Maxwell's stories he finds himself over his head and potentially on the biggest story of his career. Now he just needs to stay out of jail, and alive.

movies.name: Can't Buy My Love
movies.details: A nerdy outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to be his girlfriend.

movies.name: Political Incorrect
movies.details: Four guests from the worlds of politics and entertainment join host Bill Maher for a free-wheeling and humorous discussion of current events.

movies.name: Attack on Titan: Part 1
movies.details: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.
